00046             function          show_list_of_messages( $Options )
00047             {
00048                   try
00049                   {
00050                         $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00051                         $Paging = get_package( 'gui::paging' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00052                         $Paging->set( 'FormId' , 'error_log_form' );
00053                         $Paging->set( 'Prefix' , 'error_log' );
00054                         $Paging->set( 'Header' , $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'header.tpl' ) );
00055                         $Paging->set( 'Footer' , $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'footer.tpl' ) );
00056                         $Paging->set( 'ItemTemplate' , $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'item_template.tpl' ) );
00057                         $Paging->set( 
00058                               'DataAccessor' , 
00059                               create_function( 
00060                                     '$s , $l , $f , $o' , 
00061                                     "\$ErrorLogAlgorithms = get_package( 'error_log::error_log_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ ".
00062                                     ");return( \$ErrorLogAlgorithms->select_messages( \$s , \$l , \$f , \$o ) );"
00063                               )
00064                         );
